article_title: Ohio State’s new James Cancer Hospital won surprising U.S. aid
article_text:

article_metadata.description: In December 2009, politically powerful U.S. Sen. Chris Dodd of Connecticut inserted a $100 million “hospital construction grant” into the Affordable Care Act bill, which a Senate committee he headed was helping to write.
